improvement_list.improvement_desc: Potential division by zero error.  The variable 'y' can become 0 inside the loop, leading to a runtime error when calculating 'z = x / y'. Add a check to ensure 'y' is not zero before the division.
The loop iterates 49 times.  Consider adding a check that 'x' is not going too negative to prevent unexpected behaviour from integer overflow.

The condition 'x % 2' can be simplified to check if 'x' is even or odd. There is no apparent performance benefit to this improvement in this case. The performance of modulo operation may be optimized at compiler level depending on context and hardware.
